name: cycle_length
description: Time interval at which the measurement cycle restarts (in minutes e.g. 30 if every half hour).

name: linfit_secs
description: Seconds after exclude_start used for calculating a linear fit to CO2 increase.

name: exclude_start
description: Seconds after chamber close exluded from flux calculation (Deadband). Not used - see chambersetup config file

name: exclude_end
description: Seconds before chamber open excluded from flux calculation. Not used - see chambersetup config file

name: prepurge
description: not used - see chambersetup config file

name: postpurge
description: not used - see chambersetup config file

name: timeclose
description: not used - see chambersetup config file
